column1: Lyrics	Transliteration	Direct Translation	Poetic Translation,,,
・・・ﾆ・・・ﾆ	imo to are to	my little sister and I	Little Sister and I,,,
・｢・・・ｳ・ﾌ・R・ﾌ	irusanoyama no	are on the mountain	On the mountain,,,
・R・・	yamararagi	the mountain orchid	Among orchid blooms:,,,
・・・ﾈ・・・・・G・・・ｻ・・	te na tori fure soya	take and touch it with your hand	Take and touch them with gentle hands;,,,
・e・ﾜ・ｳ・・・ｪ・ﾉ・・	kao masaruga ni ya	its form is growing	"Their tender beauty is growing,"

column4: Their bloom too quickly is growing.

column2: Markham", Elizabeth. Saibara: Japanese Court Songs of the Heian Period. Vol. 2. Cambridge: Cambridge UP," 1983. Print. ""
